# File lib/cucumber/cli/main.rb, line 79
      def exceeded_tag_limts?(features)
        exceeded = false
        configuration.options[:include_tags].each do |tag, limit|
          unless limit.nil?
            tag_count = features.tag_count(tag)
            if tag_count > limit.to_i
              exceeded = true
            end
          end
        end
        exceeded
      end
